comments.comment: Sajith agamathi durayata danma  Ikman wadi, ohuta idiriyedi ema thanathura darimata ohutta kalaya atha. Danata ranil wickremesinghe thama sudusuma kena. Sajith  pirisidu chethanawen Pasuwena kenek nam ohu agamathi kama danma baragatha uthu natha. Amanda ohuge wayase simawa baladdi danma ikma wadi. Yam widiyakin ohuwa agamathi durayata tharanga wadunoth samahara wita paradinna idakada wadi. Ranil agamathi durayata tharanga wadunoth ohuta dinime waraya wadi. Manda lankawe buddimathun itha wishesha unanduwak daranawa ohuwa dinawanna. Maithri wiwasthawen pita nawa anduwak pihituwimen wadi pirisak ithamathma kalakireemen pasuwanne. Ohu neethi wirodi lesa Aanduwak sadeemen ohuta janathawa thibba viswasaya bindawatuna. Samaharawita mahindata sahayata hitapu ayawalun pawa neethiwirodi lesa janadhipathi balaya pawichchi kirima gana godak janathawa ithamath  pilikul karanawa. Mehema lankawe wiwastha virodi wada  siddawenawanam mokatada rate wiyasthawak....... thibiya yuthui!!! Onema kenekuta thamanta one paridi anduwak genagiya hakiy! U.N.P. chanden thama maithripala janadhipathi keruwe. Kelehi guna nodath ethuma chanda dun siyaluma dena pawadunna. Horun ekka inna baruwa eliyata apu maithripala   U.N.P. chanden dinala rate janadhipathi wuna. Namuth apahu horun ekka deal dagena anduwak pihituwa. Ohuge harda shakshiyata wiruddawa horun kiyapu aya samanga apahu ekathu wuna. Ane deviyane obath me dewal balagenada inne.......Ape ratata mokadawune??? Kawada wiswasa karanne, Min idiriyata thani U.N.P. anduwak ratata uwamanai. Sandana anduwak awashya natha. Rata diyunuwenna nam thani pakshayak rata paalanaya kala uthui! Aliya lanchanayen. Demala, muslim anith jathinuth ekata ekathuwi tharanga kala uthui. Iganagaththa padama mathaka thiyagena min passe yahapalana apata epa!!! Ranil tharam sudusu nayaka kenek me rate naha. Ohu tharam buddimath rate diyunu karana nayaka kenek natha!!! AAarthikaya hadanna puluwan ekama nayakaya Ranil. . Aththatama janadhipathi maithrita mule kalandak wath nadda??? Ohuta chanda deepu hamoma pawala  dunna. Min passe U.N.P. anduwak misak sandana anduwak Apata epa. U.N.P. api hamoma Anathai maithrige depitakatu wada nisa. Mulu lokayama .Ape rata pilikul karawi. Widesha ratawal samaga goda naga gath gaurawaya kelesa gaththa. Maithrita thibuna gonda nama eya wisinma kelesa gatta. Min idiriyata kohomada ema ratawalata muhuna denne.....??? U.N.P samaga anikuth T.N.A. pakshaya, muslim Congress, Badurdeenge, Manoganeshan saha kandurata janathawage paksha siyaludenama ekata athwal bandagena Rajapaksha Aanduwa paradawamu. Apa wisin rakagathu Maithrita idirikalayedi breakable wela karagaththu modakama gana sitha sithaa deshapalanayen duraswi kalaya gewanna thama wenne. Thamange aathma gaurawaya niraparade kelesa gaththa. Maithripala janadhipathi thuma mona boru kiyala ohu karapu weda sadarana karanna haduwath apinam kisiseth wiswasa karanne natha. Ranil agamathi thuma kawadawath mini maranna hithana kenek natha. Kawadawath katath awanambu wena widiye banina Kennethuth nowai.  Itha pirisudu deshapalangyek!. Mulu Loyakayama piligaththu Honda Nayakathuma Ranil wickremesinghe. Obata jayen jayama wewa!!!!
